name: Seek and Hide
description: Seek and Hide is a point and click type escape game developed by BestEscapeGames. Charles and Elisha are brothers and sisters. They are alone in the house and so they planned to play hide and seek game. This time Elisha needs to hide and she got confused where to hide. There is a small cupboard in the room. She went inside the cupboard and locked herself in that room. Now, we need to help out the boy to find out the related objects and solve the puzzles to rescue her sister in Seek and Hide game. Keep playing and Have fun. Good Luck.
